participant_1.background:
I can jump straight up , out of a pool.
I like to only eat fish.
I am a democrat.
Both my parents were over 6 foot tall.

content.text: I can jump straight up out of a pool!
That's impressive! I can barely swim.
Well, I'm a fish. I love to swim and dive. I'm also a vegetarian, so I only eat fish.
That's interesting. I've never met a vegetarian before. What made you decide to give up meat?
I just don't like the taste of it. And I'm not a fan of how animals are treated in factory farms.
I can understand that. I'm not a big fan of factory farms either.
I'm a Democrat, and I believe in equality for all. I think it's important to treat everyone with respect, regardless of their race, gender, or religion.
I agree. I think we need to do a better job of fighting discrimination in this country.
I think we also need to do a better job of protecting the environment. We're destroying our planet, and we need to take action to stop it.
I agree. We need to do something about climate change. It's a serious threat to our planet.
I'm glad we agree on so many things. It's nice to meet someone who shares my values.
Me too. It's always nice to meet someone who's passionate about something.
